name: Crazy Cheese (Joshimuz)
description:
Teamimuz Present: CRAZY CHEESE!

It's a Crazy Taxi inspired Open World Delivery Simulator. You have 5 minutes to deliver as much Saint-Marcellin cheese you can in the busy streets of Newcastle. Unlock 2 awesome vehicles as you battle through really dumb traffic (the bad AI is a feature OK?).

Made for the University of Portsmouth's GameJam 2021 in 4 days

Only known supported resolution is 1920x1080 (1080p, 16:9).

Credits:

Art: Emma "Kitteamuz" Winters

Design + Programming: Joshua "Joshimuz" Edwards

Outside Sources:

Music/Sounds: Eugenio "Ophicleidon" Bruno
